name: Grappling Scarf
text: A scarf you are wearing frays at the end into hook-like shapes and can extend to incredible lengths. Although your scarf retains its weight, its frayed ends function as a grappling hook that can be thrown with a range increment of 20 feet. Your scarf elongates to 100 feet the first time it is thrown during the spell duration. Regardless of its apparent material, the scarf is as strong and easy to climb as a knotted silk rope. At the end of the duration, the scarf detaches and returns to its former shape, fluttering down from its position if you haven’t already retrieved it.
text_zh: 一条你穿着的围巾磨损，最终变成勾状，并可以延长到不可思议的长度。尽管你的勾子重量跟围巾一样，在磨损结束后如爪勾(grappling hook)般运作，并可以用来扔掷，射程增量为20尺。在此法术持续时间内，你的勾子在首次扔掷可以伸长至100尺。不论材料为何，勾子足够强韧，并能轻易用来攀爬，就好像打好结的丝绳。在法术持续时间结束时，勾子分离并且返回先前的形状，如果你还没准备好取回它，它会在它的位置上缓缓飘落。
